Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored the only goal of the match in the first half
Dani Olmo's clever pass released Torres
Joselu had a volley that flew just past the post in the second half
Olmo burst from deep, right through the middle and had a go from inside the centre circle
Armando Broja had a shot saved by David Raya
Asllani had a shot blocked, and then another shot just past the far post
Pre-Game Insights: Sylvinho said that many people claimed Spain would put four past Albania in the first game, five in the second, and they wouldn't show up for the third
Spain's coach had said that even the seleccion's B team could play the final, and still be favourite
Post-Match Reflections: Sylvinho praised Albania for their proud display and their determination to compete
The Albanian coach said they had known they wouldn't progress beyond the group stage, but they came to enjoy the tournament and to compete
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played with a comfort and confidence by Spain
Albania were the most international of teams, with players born in nine different countries
The match was a proud display by Albania, who left the pitch noisily and proudly
